website_summaries.verdict: These beautiful grill tongs are the ideal size and shape for all of your grilling needs. Complete with solid oak panels on the handles, these tongs are not only useful, but stylish.
pros: 16" long handles keep your hands safe from the BBQ heat
cons: Some have said that the grip of the tongs isn't strong enough

customer_reviews.title: What a shame!
customer_reviews.text: The metal on these is super flimsy. My husband used these once and the metal bent. I was able to rebend them back to their almost original shape easily with my bare hands while washing them, that’s how flimsy they are, but they are just gonna bend again next time he attempts to use them. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: km2008

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as expected
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Locking tab is too loose amounting to tongs that lock if your holding angle is too steep. Heads flush with handles that pinch the palm with a regular grip. Heads are literally paper thin and will bend at the base. Pros: Comfortable wood when handling. Symmetrical and look pretty sharp. Nice "GRILLHOGS" engraving on the wood. There's much to be desired mechanically. The locking tab isn't a deal breaker--but to change a common holding position while flipping food so not to get violently pinched, is.
customer_reviews.author: byebyelabs

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing I Bought Myself All Year!!
customer_reviews.text: Every year I took what I had out to the gas grill and used to turn meat, flip brats and try to cook on my gas grill. And every year despite being quick I had slightly sunburned type forearms red and sore from the heat!! I bought these tongs!! Yesterday I tried them out!! Long and beautiful with some nice wood trim out of way of heat!! Great grip. Quality workmanship!! I thought I was in heaven!! Brats cooked easily and I couldn’t believe how nice the tongs were at a very nice price! Thanks! You need a pair or 2 of these!!! Best thing I bought myself all year!
customer_reviews.author: labrador mom

customer_reviews.title: 5 years of use
customer_reviews.text: Got these about 5 and half years ago. It is the only tool I need to manipulate food on the grill. It is fine for burgers, steaks, briskets, franks, etc... While for burgers arguably a spatula would be better, this is more than fine and there is no reason you need any other implement to handle food on the grill. Highly recommend. See some comments about pinching skin on this, but that has never happened to me. Could be something to do with hand size. Definitely recommend and this is something I have also given as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: matt1234

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and dump that wobbly twisting dept. Store P.O.S.
customer_reviews.text: The prior 5 star reviewer's covered pretty much all I could say i.e. tong tips match perfectly. No wobble, no flex, no twist. Solid well built. Thought I'd have to seal the would grips, not so. Already done, they come with sealer better than I could ever find. Bought food grade mineral oil for my bread boards but it pales in comparison but it's a different end use all together. Put it this way, the wood hand grips will not stain or discolor. As of now an easy 5 stars. Highly recommended and I'll admit that I'm not real easy to please.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Big boy thongs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. These are now my primary bbq weapon. The ones I had before were crap but I didn’t even know how crappy they were until I got these. These thongs are sturdy, precise and easy to clean. You can tell by holding them that they will last a long time. My only problem with these is that they do not fit the Weber genesis tool holders so I will need to attach a strap. Still worth it tho
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Mid-size tongs, grip foods of all sizes
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to replace some extra-long tongs that were awkward and didn't handle smaller items well. The Grillhogs are great, a good size, and the scalloped tips get a firm grip on food without damaging it. I was less-than-impressed with the "hollow" construction of tong handles -- grease gets inside and and that's a bit of pain to clean.
customer_reviews.author: K. G. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality Grill Tongs
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best grill tongs I have ever found. The metal is heavy and the hinge doesn't skew when grabbing a heavy piece of meat. I grill a lot on my Big Green Egg and heavy-duty long reach tongs are required. The wood part of the handle provides a better grip than flat-sided tongs. I am completely satisfied with this purchase. My only "complaint" is that I can't find a long heavy-duty meat fork to accompany these tongs. When hoisting a 10-pound standing rib roast from a blazing hot grate while searing the meat, short lightweight forks just do not perform. I keep hoping that Grillhogs will introduce the accompanying tool as good as their tongs.
customer_reviews.author: Floridian

customer_reviews.title: Man Tongs
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these to use with my smoker. Seem to work great grabbing and flipping heavy tri tip I cooked over the Super Bowl weekend. They hold up very well and seem very rigid and sturdy compared to the big box flimsy tongs. Standard tongs bend with weight and the harder you squeeze to pick up the more you bend them. Not sure if they are dishwasher safe so I've been hand washing them, so just be careful because they do have wood grips and it could potentially swell or warp. Other that that they seem to be working great, I can't want to try these out on some ribs and a big ol brisket. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: these are great tongs. They feel very sturdy and solidly made ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are great tongs. They feel very sturdy and solidly made in your hands. The spring mechanism isn't some cheap spring that will break sooner rather than later...these should last a while. The locking mechanism works well. We would really like a nicer pair but the more expensive ones are not nicer, they just cost more. At least all the ones we have looked at and found. So for now, we love that these are cheap, solid and work well. We would love to find some with silicone grips. Even if they made these will silicone grips, we would pay more for these. Hint, hint lol.
customer_reviews.author: truthfulreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: The price is very good and this will get the job done. I think it’s 16”, but when using it, I wished it was longer. The grips are also not as long as I would have liked. It’s my fault though, I didn’t want to spend $17 on a tong with superior ratings because eventually I’m going to get a new set. If you just want one that’s inexpensive and works, this is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet tongs.
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair of tongs they really stand up. I’m sure there is a better set out there (and I will find it) but these are great for the money. It makes a big difference having a solid pinch on your food when you have an open grill. Also, the wood on the handle is comfortable and doesn’t heat fast.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and Durable Tongs
customer_reviews.text: Versatile, sturdy and what appear to be durable tongs. I like the large "hook" that can fit virtually any type and size of grill hanger. I have Weber and the hooks are very fat. Many grill tools cannot fit them. This does.
customer_reviews.author: Dewline1

customer_reviews.title: as they are sturdy. They also lock securely (which was why we ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband for Father's day and he used them that night! He likes how they feel, as they are sturdy. They also lock securely (which was why we replaced his old pair) and hang nicely on the side of the BBQ on a hook. They did say that you receive free recipes, but the link they included on the card doesn't say anything about free recipes. Not sure what happened there, but the tongs are great!
customer_reviews.author: Terri G

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time it was used.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even make it through one side of the first meal. Handle broke trying to turn over food the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Great Tongs, Annoying Seller.
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, These tongs are awesome!! They are way more heavy duty than I expected. I love that they have a locking mechanism to keep them shut on the end of the tong. At this price the tongs simply cannot be beat. I was moving 4 lb tri tips with these and they did not bend or flex. Why the 3 Star Review? Because David Barret "Mr. Grill" keeps emailing me asking me for a review. I will write one if I wish, but do not appreciate the badgering. In short the Tongs are 5 Star, the Seller "Fresher Products Limited" and Mr. Grill are annoying at 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Lightning legz

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and good price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of these BBQ tongs. They have a nice weight and subsequent stiffness so they won't be bending like my old stamped set. The reach is just right and the wood handle scales make them comfortable in my hands. The old set will now be relegated to moving the briquettes around. I am not in the least concerned that these are made off shore since that is what free trade is all about.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This arrived recently the next day after I ordered it. I haven't used it so far but I can see that it''s much better than my previous one. The locking feature to keep it closed is great. I had a problem with the old one staying closed when I went to store it. This one has a positive lock that works by pulling up on the hanging tab at the top. Close the tongs and pull up the tab to keep it closed, push the tab down and it opens. Great quality with wooden strips to keep your hands from burning while you use it. A good design well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Al M. Rancho Murieta, CA

customer_reviews.title: Get these tongs!  Get two of them even!
customer_reviews.text: These things get the job done! Moving big slabs of meat is one thing but I use tongs for other things too from lifting hot heavy grill grates, flipping delicate veggies, bacon, etc and even serving salads. They close well, the locking mechanism doesn't slip, they're comfortable and solid in the hands. I'm not delicate with them and use/wash them aggressively, even in the dishwasher and the wood is holding strong and true. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: GabeZ

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tongs based on the positive reviews and I am happy to say that I agree with the positive reviews. They are perfect for grilling. The tongs are long enough that you don't have to worry about being burnt by the grill. I have smaller hands and they are easy and comfortable to hold. One pair is enough for me at this moment, but if I need another I will be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: KailR

customer_reviews.title: even having seen other reviews I already gave myself a good pinch with it
customer_reviews.text: Wow these are really solid and classy looking. I wish they didn't have the hole by your pinky... even having seen other reviews I already gave myself a good pinch with it...but otherwise these are perfect... if not a little bigger than I expected them to be (I guess I didn't process the dimensions consciously).
customer_reviews.author: TheGuy

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy tongs from a manufacturer that stands behind its product
customer_reviews.text: The tongs are well made and sturdy, and I was impressed by an email I received from Grillhogs, which states "If there are any problems with your item, just send us a message through Amazon and we'll aim to respond the same day!" I don't anticipate any problems, but it's good to know that they stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Best grill tongs I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best grill tongs I've ever owned. They have made my grilling life so much easier. My son, who does most of the grilling, says they are pretty rad. This mean really great to an 18 year old. Seriously though, they open and close really easily and they stay closed (this is the first pair of tongs I've ever had that close up right). Also easy to clean, the edges are really smooth and sticky bbq sauce slides right off with a sponge. The wood part is soft and smooth and nicely finished so I'm sure they will stand up well over time.
customer_reviews.author: Trio

customer_reviews.title: Great tongs
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice set of grilling tongs. Well made, sturdy and with a touch of class with the oak panels. I been using them for a couple of months and have no complaints. they work great and can lift big chunks of beef with ease. I paid $12 for these, with I think is fair, there are far cheaper ones out there, and I own several cheaper ones, but the quality is not there. These tongs will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MadridMig

customer_reviews.title: Grill masters delight!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly protected by wood on the handle, these long great grip GRILLHOGS are the perfect answer for any pro or backyard Pit Master. The sure grip large clamshell design lets you toss a large steak or tiny shrimp with cool easy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tongs -- pinch the food not your hand
customer_reviews.text: Nice tongs with a really nice grip on food. Long enough to keep you from grilling your hand or arm and, the wooden inlaid handle is nice for control. I have to agree with several other reviewers, however-- be careful not to pinch the side of your palm parallel to the little finger when closing the tongs.
customer_reviews.author: Sgd

customer_reviews.title: They are super sturdy and not flimsy when picking up heavy pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a gift. He really wanted grilling tongs on a hinge instead of the standard ones you get in a set. They are very high quality. They are super sturdy and not flimsy when picking up heavy pieces of meat. I like that they are very easy to clean and the length is great so you are not burning your arm hair off getting things on the back of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: High quality but strange design
customer_reviews.text: High quality grilling tongs - which you would expect at this price point. Odd placement of the wooden handles effectively shortens the working length of the tongs from 16" to 14 -1/2". Not sure I understand that. The purpose of tongs, after all, is to keep your hands as far as possible from the coals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tongs
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are just right for lifting and turning chops and other food on the grill. The blades on the front are curved just a little, making it easy to hold onto your hot dog but you can easily slip them under a steak. The wood on the handles insulates you from the hot grill. The length is just right, and the amount of force needed to close the tongs is perfect. You can close these tongs so they hold tight, a feature we do not use but its there if you want it,
customer_reviews.author: Sheila D,

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not much thought in design for practicality
customer_reviews.text: Biggest issue is the tension of the spring. The spring keeping the tongs open is a bit too strong so if you're spending 5 minutes or more at the grill continuously flipping food your hand and forearm will be a bit tired from squeezing the tongs.
customer_reviews.author: Tran

customer_reviews.title: Nice tongs!
customer_reviews.text: Nice tings! I’d lost a pair from a bbq set and I really like these and especially the locking system.
customer_reviews.author: TrickPH

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: They go perfect with our new Blackstone Griddle, as they are long but with great grip control.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: VIDEO REVIEW OF THE 16" LONG LUXURY OAK BARBECUE GRILL TONGS by Mr Grill
customer_reviews.text: ((((( FULL DISCLOSURE ))))) ((((( THIS TOOL WAS OFFERED TO ME AT NO CHARGE BY MR GRILL ))))) ((((( WITH THE REQUEST OF RECEIVING AN HONEST PRODUCT REVIEW FROM ME. ))))) ((((( I am making that fact known in compliance with ))))) (((((AMAZON.COM rules for posting reviews. ))))) -------- PLEASE SEE MY VIDEO REVIEW OF THIS PRODUCT --------
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tongs, would recommend or buy again
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are excellent for both in the house or the grill, but they are clearly made for the grill. They are long enough for the grill to use without getting burned, and they are sturdy enough to handle the biggest cuts of meat yet you could easily use them on more delicate stuff like veggies or shrimp. They are designed well and you can easily unlock one handed. You could lock them one handed also if you have something to hook the end on.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J Eastin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This tong grips the food well and is comfortable to hold. I purchased it specifically to help with flipping veges on the grill, which can be very elusive, and for it's long handle, to help keep my hand away from the heat. It has a clip to lock the tongs close together when not in use, which is very handy for storage. I have used it on chicken as well as pork chops and it just works great. Not that it matters much, but it is an attractive tool as well. I am very satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: I love them, and they work perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love them, and they work perfectly, but mine do not have a way to permanently close them when not in use. There is no way to lock them shut. Besides that, everything as advertised. Definitely very precise grip. Had issues with my last pair where picking up a single piece of asparagus was not an easy task, these work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty yet light weight to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and sturdy. Seems like they can handle any weight of meat. Should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie G.

customer_reviews.title: Not Swedish craftsmanship, but better than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the Mr. Grill spatula which I gave a gracious 1 star review, these tongs are pretty darn good for the price. The hanger is cheap stamped metal connected by an even cheaper rivet and I don't expect it to last long, but so far so good and am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chico Reader

customer_reviews.title: Best BBQ tongs I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite grill tongs. Good spring opens them up nice and firm. Flat edges allow sticking under food to break stuck food loose. Wood on handle helps with grip when I wear a BBQ mitt. 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Petez

customer_reviews.title: Don't wait, buy it now!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm over 60 years old. So you have to believe I've been "grilling" for a long long time! I've had many different brands of tongs over the years. Many have looked good, but none have ever been a pleasure to use as these. Strong, sturdy, well built, these handle thick steaks and Tri-tips with ease. And you ony have to use one hand. Don't hesitate a moment longer, buy one of these today! Wish I had found these years ago! Maybe my hair wouldn't be so gray!! 👍😁
customer_reviews.author: Steelhorzz

customer_reviews.title: Only tongs I use now!!
customer_reviews.text: I went and tossed the other ones I had away. I even go get them for small things in the kitchen. these are solid, sturdy, and easy to use. very, very happy I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design suits all grill uses
customer_reviews.text: Best thoughts went into the design of these tongs. Long enough so I can get to the items at the back of the grill without getting burned. The oak inserts provide a great gripping surface. The tips make it easy to pick up bacon strips, yes I do my bacon on the grill. The latching tab at the end makes it easy to hang it on a hook between uses.
customer_reviews.author: DriveAbout

customer_reviews.title: Super grill tongs
customer_reviews.text: Great tongs!! They stay cool when using on grill. Easy to pick up steaks and other meats or vegetables. Strong and love that they lock closed so they can be hung from a hook beside my grill.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn M. Lestina

customer_reviews.title: Best I've seen
customer_reviews.text: Great product - solid, long enough to keep my hand out of the fire and the wood in the handle insulates the tongs even when warm. Looked at several stores before I found these. Glad I waited.
customer_reviews.author: Pseudonymous Bob

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy!
customer_reviews.text: These tongs worked great on my grill. The length is perfect so I could keep my hands and wrists far away from the flames. They grabbed and held onto sausage, grilled corn & large chicken thighs without slipping. I like the locking mechanism for closure & how it is also a loop for hanging instead of those loose metal loops on other tongs. They also look really snazzy - would be a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: TexasTurtlegirl

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grilling
customer_reviews.text: Awesome products. They are right length and sturdy. I also like how they look and they match my BBQ set. We had to use the tongs from the old set to removed a gigantic rat my cat brought into our house. No one wanted to touch burgers with that. I did not think I would find something that would go with my old set. Imagine my happiness when I found something in matching design but even better in quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonka

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Tongs
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I only wish they had slightly better grip. Update; I bought these tongs December 2016, and I grill every week 2 to 3 times a week. These things are great. Still in like new condition. I increased my review because of how well these have held up.
customer_reviews.author: J_ECHO_3

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these and they last a long time (had a few years already)!! Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Riebeling

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TONGS
customer_reviews.text: We got them and my boyfriend used them that night. He loved them. They were easy to use and the wood handle part was great for gripping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I hate cheap stuff and these are the exact opposite. These are strong, the ends come together and I can easily pickup anything I have on the grill regardless of how big or small. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T. Dore

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Tongs
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the quality and length. It has kept us from getting burnt at the grill. We are just learning how to smoke meats and get better at grilling meats to where they are a lot more tender and juicy.
customer_reviews.author: budmanscreen

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I threw away my previous tongs as soon as tried this one. Two small issue worth mentioning. Wooden handle is polished and a bit slippery especially when you get some grease on it during grilling. I am planning sand it. Hanging loop is very narrow and does no fit Weber grill's hooks. Use some extra wire/ring/chain to hang it, or store inside the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Ooops

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to lock and unlock, Fantastic design and works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product
customer_reviews.text: Is a must for every "Grill Master"...an excellent tool. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tongs for my husband because our other ones were totally worn out. These tongs work really well! They grip the meat giving you plenty of control, have a long handle so you don't get burned, and are strong. These are great tongs, especially for the money. I am glad I paid attention to what other reviewers were saying and bought these tongs.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S

customer_reviews.title: Nice tongs! Even grip
customer_reviews.text: Nice tongs! Even grip. Positive spring. Minimized pinch points. Good wood to protect hands from heat. Pull out locking handle that fits most BBQ-side hang hooks. I also love how the grip spades are flat enough to slide under delicate items for lifting and turning. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Skorzy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Wide grip opening. Well made. Stainless Steel. Sturdy. Lockable closed. I do a lot of grill'n! These are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: TEXAS

customer_reviews.title: Great tongs
customer_reviews.text: Grill tongs are so hard to find outside a set. My fiance already has a really nice grill spatula, so all I wanted was a st of tongs. These are great. Really easy to clean, long enough for the grill and the wood gives it a really nice esthetic. They also aren't ridiculously expensive! They also shipped in a timely manner and arrived exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Mallo

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and the wood on the grip gives it a soft easy hold. Lock feature is easy only if you have a free hand. Tongs evenly come together and grip well.
customer_reviews.author: ART

customer_reviews.title: Great Tongs
customer_reviews.text: Great grill tongs. Very long and effective. I really like the locking feature it has. You can pull the tab at the base of the tongs to lock the tongs at the angle they're currently at. Pushing it back lets the tongs release as far as they can. Really, these have just been perfect for their use and at a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are solid and sturdy. Lock and unlocks easily. A pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with these tongs. Thanks to the skill of Mr Grill!
customer_reviews.text: Good solid tongs. Easy to use, easy to clean & the spring is not exhausting for the hand when flipping a whole bunch of small items. It would probably be a good idea to rub a little olive oil on the wooden handles now and again if you clean them in the dishwasher. Just to prevent the wood drying out and cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Scotto D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect "feel" from the get-go!
customer_reviews.text: You never consider how a really good set of tongs work until you're stuck using ones that aren't so good. Most of the ones readily available turn out to have one flaw or another, but after my first use of this one I have no reservations about recommending it. The feel and functionality are both perfect. I have finally found the grilling tongs I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Steve McKibben

customer_reviews.title: Great tongs, light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The most important part about them is that they are not too Heavy!! A lot of other tongs being sold are these huge heavy contraptions that are too bulky to work with. These are perfect! They are light and easy to use, but not cheap. I bought them for my husband and he loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Luxury Oak Barbecue Trill Tongs
customer_reviews.text: The tongs are fine but the gauge of stainless is a bit thinner than needed when grilling a nice Tri-Tip or London Broil. I have another pair made out of heavier gauge metal and they don't twist or bend, these are OK for a small steak, dogs or items that don't have any mass to them.
customer_reviews.author: deddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, strong grip and well made. Long handles with a solid grip allows me to securely grip bigger items on my grill such as a whole 5lb. chicken and roasts that weigh several pounds. A bargain at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the tongs!! Well built, and study. Don't get the cheap Chinese crap. You'll be happy with GRILLHOGS!
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tongs except no loop to hang them with.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent tongs and the size is perfect for me. The only complaint I have is the metal piece at the end of the handle. I can't hang it from the grill handle with that and had to add a loop to it. I got a spatula from the same company that did come with a loop, so I don't know why they didn't do the same with this one.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingGeek

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold and use
customer_reviews.text: I lost my last pair of these and tried another brand and they were not as easy to handle as these. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bonneville

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What He Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband, the grillmaster. It's exactly what he wanted...long tongs for the grill with wood on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tongs
customer_reviews.text: Long enough to keep hands out of the hot zone and the "hanging" hook you see on the end is also used to lock the tongs together for easier storage. There's not a lot of sexy things to say about grilling gear. These work very well and are solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: JRausta

customer_reviews.title: Great for all grillers, learning and experienced
customer_reviews.text: Just learning to grill and liked the length and the overall feel of the tool.
customer_reviews.author: M Reece

customer_reviews.title: Great to use my go to on the grill
customer_reviews.text: I used some tongs for 20 years and finally after the wood had fallen off the handels I decided to get new ones. My wife bought me a lot of different types. I didn't like any. Some to big, some didn't hold the food, some perforated the food. Then I found these and I love them. Just right I hope to be using these for the next 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Glen A.

customer_reviews.title: I like the length
customer_reviews.text: I like the length, the wooden handles, the ease for closing the tongs and the smooth sides of the grip end. I use others that have ends bent 90 degrees for a firm grip, but that is not what I always want. For example, when I want to slide the tongs under the thing being grasped. This a well made piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Wishful Dreams - Tim Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! The tongs are large enough to handle a large, heavy steak and sturdy enough to grab on without slipping. I bought a deluxe grill tools kit and I found the provided tongs were weak and hard to handle whatever I put on the grill. These do the trick. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: TV's John Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tongs!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something functional yet heavy duty that wouldn't fall apart like other tongs and these really met my needs. Built like a tank, work great, and a good price. I think these will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Darrl

customer_reviews.title: Grabs food with ease
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a kitchen gadget snob. I bought these for him as a gift. He wanted tongs that weren't hard to open, but would easily grab food. These tongs fit the bill! So far, he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: C. McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for sure
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend these tongs. They are difficult to open and pince your hands when using. Overall a poor item
customer_reviews.author: Jim C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like these easy to hold great grip really well built These will last a lot of years
customer_reviews.author: darryl obrien

customer_reviews.title: With these Mr. Grill Tongs, you get more than you pay for....WAY more.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe these tongs are less than $10. I marvel at the build quality and the beautiful real wood overlays. It even has an ingenious lock function to keep them in a closed position while hanging. I bought the matching spatula and brass grate brush for less than $30 total?!! I'm now a Mr. Grill fan.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great grilling tongs! Not too big but work for everything and look like they should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick H

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-made.
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy, well-made, good looking tongs. Nice and long so you don't get too exposed to the heat, and nice comfortable handles with the wood trim.
customer_reviews.author: jrandkr

customer_reviews.title: Nice and long so I don't get burned
customer_reviews.text: Nice and long so I don't get burned. Tong ends are long enough to slip under a large piece of meat to center them before flipping meat to sear on the other side. Haven't put them in the dishwasher because of the wood, but hand washing is quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Chesney

customer_reviews.title: ... scorched with the short tongs so bought these and love them.
customer_reviews.text: Was tired of getting my hands scorched with the short tongs so bought these and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great tongs,great price
customer_reviews.text: Great tongs , great price. Used for moving charcoal around for Dutch oven cooking. Only thing is I pinched my hand a couple of times due to them closing a all the way. Have to watch that but love how can be used with or without gloves while cooking with Dutch oven.
customer_reviews.author: Vkesu

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the best tongs I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best tongs I have ever used.. They work perfectly and handle anything you could possibly want to attempt to pick up by hand on the grille.. Great product, great company and they stand behind their product too.. Buy it, you will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: TJB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tongs! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Tongs work excellent! Wasn't sure how I would like them seeing as they are different than any BBQ tongs I had used before but they're great! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Tong, Tong, Tong!
customer_reviews.text: Tongs work well without cutting into the meat; my last pair, bought from a well known supercenter, would slice hot dogs right in half when you tried to pick them up. They're a nice quality, decent weight (not light and flimsy), and look good. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Milkbery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grilling.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tongs for the grill. The ones we had before were very bulky and hard to grab things with. These are perfect. Great size for my husband and myself to both use. Can pick up a large steak or grilled vegetables with ease.
customer_reviews.author: JACK R. NUGENT

customer_reviews.title: I'll have to wait till Spring to use these tongs ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll have to wait till Spring to use these tongs. I am sure the quality of these BBQ tongs will give me a long use.
customer_reviews.author: Brave Explorer

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Tongs
customer_reviews.text: Great Grill Tongs. After receiving the first pair, found them to be as described, strong, wouldn't flex or twist with weight, very comfortable to hold and use.. Purchased a second for my Son. Sold at a great price. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Toolmaster49

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: Too long, hard to grip, tong tips too wide to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: GYM5686

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy el cheapo bbq tongs at the local retail store. These are the ones you REALLY want! Sturdy, long and SS. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: 1776TX

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and the built quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jay H

customer_reviews.title: Super long so no risk of getting burned and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband and he loves them! Super long so no risk of getting burned and they grab the food with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lentini

customer_reviews.title: The BEST grilling tongs and affordable
customer_reviews.text: The best grilling tongs and affordable. High quality metal and wood. Nice locking mechanism. I had bought 3 other types before these that were complete crap. These are GREAT and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Naha

customer_reviews.title: Nice BBQ tool for one & all😎.
customer_reviews.text: Superb, affordable, & functional grilling tongs. I bought these as a gift for my son to use with his new Weber Grill. He is a novice to cooking outdoors but deserves to start with great tools. These fit that category!
customer_reviews.author: tom luza

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, easy to clean. They stayed outside for some winter grilling and did not rust or break despite heavy rains and snows sometimes hitting the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: If you BBQ, you need these.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy tongs. Long enough that my hubby doesn't burn his precious hands. We do a lot of BBQ'ing is the summer and we are definitely getting good use of these tongs. So far, they have held up well and my husband is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: BettieBoop77

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy set of SS tongs that are capable of picking ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy set of SS tongs that are capable of picking up heavier items without bending or twisting. The length is good for reaching far back on the grill. The wooden handles provide an easier grip and leverage for squeezing the tongs. Attractive pricing.
customer_reviews.author: AB971

product_meta.title: GRILLHOGS Barbecue Grill Tongs 9 Inch, Best Metal Kitchen Tongs for Cooking and Grill Accessories, Stainless Steel + Oak Wood BBQ Tongs
feature_bullets: *DURABLE MATERIAL*: Crafted for seasoned BBQ grillers with high quality stainless steel and damage resistant oak wood.

*SAFE & RELIABLE*: Long handles allows you to keep your hands cool while maintaining control. Wooden oak handle prevents heat from reaching your hands making GRILLHOGS tongs the perfect large tongs for cooking.
*COMFORTABLE GRIP*: The sturdy and smooth wood oak handle makes this one of the best grill tools available. This is a must have for your ultimate BBQ accessories set up.
*LOCK & HOOK*: Use the Lock and Hook feature to keep your tongs for grilling neat and compact.

*HUNGRY FAN COMMUNITY*: By purchasing this product, you now become part of the largest community of game day and entertainment enthusiasts! We value the quality and durability of our products and strive to produce the best grilling accessories for you. We have absolute faith in our products and offer a money back guaranteed if you are not satisfied. No-questions-asked, no hassle.
